text.data:
Truce: Um... I came in here without thinking what I was doing...
I'm really nervous with all these girls here...[end]

Anastasia: When you don't have enough money or food for the dragons you should go on a side quest. You can fight a little bit and build up strength before the real thing.
That's what that slow Heavy Armor Knight Barclay said. He knows weird things like that.[end]

Anastasia: Do you remember the night of Kahna's revival? Barclay said he danced with Frederica... That slow-moving Heavy Armor Knight can do whatever he wants, but for some reason that makes me mad. But why? Why does it make me mad...?[end]

Anastasia: Did Barclay say anything to you?
Congratulations! Not really...[end1][end]

Anastasia: [character][0x0], did you know? You can create dragons that use Holy skills and ones that use Darkness skills! Max out their fire, water, and thunder elements, and then their heal or poison attribute! And their attack or defense! Barclay was saying that's how you do it. If you do that, we wizards will become even stronger. And then Barclay and the others will only play a supporting role![end]
Anastasia: Hey, [character][0x0]. If you walk slow like this you'll find all kinds of stuff. I like this. Slowly... slowly...[end]
Oh, I see. Heh heh.[end]
Whaaat?[end]
Ectarina: I wonder if he's looking at the same sky... His back always turned to me...[end]
Ectarina: He likes Sweet Wine... I'll put my heart into getting some and send him some...[end]
Ectarina: He likes Uniuji... I'll put my heart into getting some and send it to him...[end]
Ectarina: Oh, his smile... His smile for only me... Thanks to the Sweet Wine... Heh heh heh...[end]

Ectarina: But I heard he liked Uniuji... This is no good... He hates me... Why did it turn out this way...? But, it's not all bad... I'll remain in his memories as the girl who sent him Uniuji... Heh heh heh...[end]
Ectarina: I wonder what he's thinking right now... About the lovely girl who sent him Sweet Wine? Heh heh... Ah, I'm in his mind now... Heh heh...[end]

Ectarina: I wonder what he's thinking right now... About the mean girl who sent him some Uniuji? Heh heh... Ectarina, the mean girl... Should I be even meaner I wonder...
Heh heh... If I do, he'll always think about me...[end]
Ectarina: I'll do it... When all the fighting's over I'll reveal my feelings for him... If it doesn't work out... Then I'll get everybody involved... Heh heh heh... Boom!![end]

Ectarina: I remember now... [character][0x0] said it... [character][0x0] was the one who said he liked Uniuji... It's all [character][0x0]'s fault that he hates me now... I won't forget this...
When all the fighting is over, I'll get even with that [character][0x0]... Heh heh...[end]
Nelbo: Ah, [character][0x0]. It was decided that Donfan, the enemy of women, should be held here. Good, don't you think?[end]
[end1]
Donfan: Lesson!! Don't touch wizards!![end]
Nelbo: Playing as a gentlemen... This is fun.[end]
Donfan: This is miserable! This is the most humiliating thing in my life!![end]
Nelbo: I wonder if I'll make Donfan be naked next time...[end]
Donfan: Look at me! You two can be my captives!![end]

Nelbo: When the battle is over Donfan will take me to Mahal...
He says he wants to see the reflection of Mahal's lake in my eyes... But keep it a secret from my best friend Joy...[end]
Donfan: What do you think, [character][0x0]? This is my true forte![end]

Melodia: Do you like [character][0x1] too, [character][0x0]?
Of course! Not really.[end1]
...... I like you, [character][0x0]...[end]

Melodia: Hey, [character][0x0]! Do you like me?
I cannot tell a lie. I like you![end1]
Meanie![end]
Heh heh. Don't worry, don't worry. But Lukia told me not to trust men... What should I do...[end]
All wrong! You didn't say it like you mean it![end]

Melodia: Hey, [character][0x0], what'll you do when this is all over?
I haven't thought about it. All kinds of stuff![end1]
No good! Everybody thinks about things![end]
That's good, [character][0x0]! Come play with me sometimes, okay?[end]
Zora: Ah, it's so nice to see Campbell again. I just can't seem to calm down![end]

Zora: How's my son working out for you?
He's doing good work. Not very good.[end1]
That's good.[end]
I see... He doesn't live up to his name after all.[end]
...That's how he is.[end]

Frederica: I'm shaking...
It's time...
For my medicine...
Today I think I'll have some Heal SP...[end]

Frederica: I faint a lot... I make sure I fight, but... sorry.
No, we depend on you. Rest well.[end1]
Thanks... You're really nice, [character][0x0].[end]
Frederica: I'm fine. As long as I have my medicine...[end]

Frederica: I've been thinking... When the fighting's all over, I'll work hard to become well again. When that happens, [character][0x0]... Will you start a medicine store with me? Don't worry. I won't use any of the merchandise.[end]
Joy: Nelbo and I are keeping watch. Only when there's a battle do we let him out.[end]
Donfan: Lesson! Don't make a pass at priests![end]
Don't you think Donfan is cute?[end]
Joy: I wonder what we should do to Donfan next...[end]

Joy: When the war is over Donfan is going to come to Campbell for me... He told me... [0x24]I cannot believe there is anything in nature more beautiful than you! That's why I want to try comparing you.[0x22] But keep this a secret from my best friend Nelbo...[end]

Diana: Did you hear what happened between the two lancers?
What happened? I don't really wanna know.[end1]

In celebration of [character][0x1]'s return, they were doing what they always do, outside her room. You know, [0x24]Lan-lan-lancer! Stab-stab![0x22] Then Zora yelled at them to stop it.
Apparently that reminded one of them of their mother and he's homesick now. At least it's quiet again.[end]
Hmm. I see.[end]

Diana: Hey, did you hear about [character][0x1]...?
Tell me. I'm busy right now...[end1]

As usual, there are painful-sounding voices coming from her room.
I thought it was because of the Holy Dragons again... but, she's used to their anger now, isn't she? So I wonder just what is going on in there...[end]

Diana: Hey, did you hear? It's something serious!
Tell me. I'm busy now...[end1]

Melodia has some dragon panties that are important to her. But they disappeared. When we went looking for them, we found them in the men's bedroom!! They were tied to a lancer's spear! And, the owner of that spear is Reeve! That's disgusting!![end]

Diana: [character][0x0]. Is it true that the fighting's going to end soon?
I don't know. It might be true.[end1]
I see... The rumors are true then. I was thinking I should stop worrying about rumors that people make up. I've decided to pass the time leisurely while thinking about myself.[end]
Lukia: [character][0x1]'s back, so now comes the real battle. Being the only Light Armor Knight will be tough...[end]
Lukia: [character][0x0], you're pretty cool lately! Why don't you and I try to become the topic of gossip? Sorry. Sure thing![end1]
Just kidding! Relax![end]
The door to the new era has finally opened. I wonder if our happiness lies on the other side...[end]
Lukia: Everybody has started thinking about after the battles. I diligently pray that everybody will be happy. When the fighting is over, let's pray together, [character][0x0]![end]
Jeanne: Um, those two from Campbell... They're pretty good at keeping straight faces... I pity Donfan, but sometimes it's nice to have quiet around here.[end]
Donfan: This is the biggest crisis of my life![end]
Jeanne: Donfan has started to become a little flabby because of all our Sweet Honey and Cookies. I might not ever be able to see that Donfan Jump anymore.[end]
Jeanne: When the fighting's over I'm returning home with everybody from Mahal. We especially need Taicho to work hard.[end]
Mist: ...I'm still not at full strength. Let me rest when we're not fighting...[end]
What... General Palpaleos and [character][0x1]... Hmph, that little girl...[end]
Heheheh... I don't blame you for starting to like me, [character][0x0]... I am pretty cute after all...[end]
Mist: I talked with Frederica. When the fighting is over we'll all go live with Zora. The clean air of Campbell Lagoon. I look forward to it.[end]
...Campbell's clean air. My beauty will definitely be increased 100 times... Men won't leave me alone...[end][end]
